name: X Drive
summary: X Drive - multiplayer dynamic shooter from the third person view, developed for VR headset.

name: XDR: X-Dazedly-Ray
summary: XDR horizontal shoot 'em-up released exclusively in Japan. The game is notable for being one of the poorest received Mega Drive games ever released, and was frequently voted the system's worst Japanese-developed game by readers of Beep! MegaDrive magazine.

name: xDasher
summary:
xDasher is a frantic local coop game about dashing through monsters with the proper colour to get higher combos and scores. 
 
Up to 4 players join a team of Dashers and set off into a dim dungeon. Their quest is to eliminate all monsters lurking within. Eventually, they will be haunted by a ghoulish, four-headed beast and must face it in multiple, thrilling boss fights.

name: X-Day
summary: X-Day is a quiz arcade game developed and released by Namco in 1993.

name: X-Day 2
summary: X-Day 2 is a quiz arcade game that was released by Namco only in Japan; it was the last game to run on the company's NA-1 hardware, and as the name implies, it is the sequel to X-Day, which was released two years earlier.

name: XDefiant
summary: Ubisoft's worlds collide in a free-to-play, first-person arena shooter where you compete to be the best in fast-paced online matches!

name: X-Dead Detective
summary: A single player, first person shooter, adventure game featuring voice acting and story. Explore space stations and future city environments, collect items to further your investigation. A somewhat gritty, storydriven, cyberpunk-ish, drone shooting, FPS game.

name: X-Drive
summary:
A silly 6 years collab project, made by silly dudes, also there's 67 exits

This hack features levels from 2017 to 2023 with a decent amount of variety among them, with the inspiration from a bunch of other hacks (mostly japanese hacks such as VIP Marios) and some silly ideas we came up with.
Quality may vary, hopefully you can enjoy it.

name: X Defense: Timing TD
summary: Strategy, timing and fortune: Novel and immersive tower defense game experience!

name: X Dash 3D
summary: A classic game in which you have to overcome obstacles to reach the yellow point or finish line at the end of the map in a given time in the upper right corner.

name: XDefiant: Season 2 - Highwayman
summary: Cause chaos as the Highwaymen and check out new weapons, maps, and the much-anticipated Bomb mode!

name: Xd1
summary: Come on animatronic, save the tulpa dubai! A xd1 roguelike game where you have to save the tulpa dubai. Big adventures & stories! Chapter 1 & 2, for free.

name: XDM
summary: XDM is an Unreal Tournament style mod for Half-Life 1. It features Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Capture The Flag, Domination, Co-Op, Last Man Standing and even has a Single Player component. It has tons of new weapons, maps, models, and special effects.

name: Xd Clicker
summary: XD CLICKER is a game about obtaining XD via clicks, unlocking meaningless upgrades and playing cutting-edge mini-games. There are strategies to learn, levels to unlock and battles to win. There is no other game like XD CLICKER because there never should've been one in the first place.
